docs.lead_paragraph: Legal Aid Society staff lawyers who represent indigent defendants in New York City walked off the job at midnight last night in a dispute over a new contract.

headline.main: Lawyers Assigned to the Poor Stage a Walkout

docs.snippet: Legal Aid Society staff lawyers who represent indigent defendants in New York City walked off the job at midnight last night in a dispute over a new contract.
